Name.label: Congenital muscular alpha-dystroglycanopathy with brain and eye anomalies
Congenital muscular dystrophy due to dystroglycanopathy

TextSection.Contents: Congenital muscular alpha-dystroglycanopathy with brain and eye anomalies (MDDGA) is a cobblestone lissencephaly characterized by and considered to be pathognomonic of a continuum of recessive autosomal disorders with brain, ocular and muscular involvement. MDDGA includes Walker-Warburg syndrome, muscle-eye-brain disease, Fukuyama muscular and cerebral dystrophy and muscle eye brain disease with bilateral multicystic leukodystrophy.

Synonym.label: Lissencephaly type 2 with muscular and ocular involvement
